entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:48 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -13.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 11:35 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -13.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -15.6°C
Wind: WSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow late this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Light snow and blowing snow. Blizzard developing overnight. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023
